ISSUE.TITLE: projet/tasks/time.php no entity filter in query
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Filter on entity field is missing, so with multicompany module installed every company can see worked hour of other company ### Environment Version all version ### Environment OS all version ### Environment Web server all version ### Environment PHP all version ### Environment Database all version ### Environment URL(s) projet/tasks/time.php ### Expected and actual behavior $sql .= " WHERE p.entity IN (".getEntity('project').")"; ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
